title: Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin Delays Rocket for Its First NASA Mission
description: Blue Origin postponed a planned second flight of its flagship New Glenn rocket on Sunday, delaying a mission that would serve as a crucial test for the Jeff Bezos-backed space company in its quest to challenge SpaceX.

title: Tether-backed Rumble, Northern Data Said  Close to Merger Deal
description: Rumble Inc. is pushing ahead with an all-share offer to buy German data center company Northern Data AG, with the deal set to value the target at less than its $894 million current market capitalization, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Apple Plans Major New Satellite-Powered Features for iPhones
description: Apple is planning a series of upgrades to its satellite features for the iPhone and its smartwatches. Also: The company is nearing a $1 billion-a-year deal to power a revamped Siri with a custom Google Gemini model, and Apple is readying the first low-cost MacBook in a bid to compete with Windows laptops.
